txt.en: Bazanmanar's Foetid Pools
Mix the clay in the mortar
Bring the clay to Golodhril
Golodhril is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should bring the plant samples to Golodhril.

'At the bottom of the nearby stairs, there are multiple fountains whose pools are clogged with something foetid and foul. Go and fetch me some of the plants, that I might study them with my own eyes.'
Return to Golodhril
Return to Golodhril
Collected plant samples ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Golodhril's workbench is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should mix the clay with the ingredients in the mortar on Golodhril's workbench.
Kurdush창lak runs the length of Clovengap.\n\nGolodhril has asked you to collect clay from the banks of Kurdush창lak.
The foetid pools are located near Bazanmanar.\n\nGolodhril has asked you to add drops of the antidote to the foetid pools.
Golodhril is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should bring the clay to Golodhril.
DNT - 'Did you fall in? Do you have the clay?'
DNT - Bring the clay to Golodhril
Golodhril is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should give Golodhril the good news.

'Did you fall in? Do you have the clay?'

You show her the wet clay.

'Excellent! This will serve perfectly. Take the clay to the workbench and mix it with the ingredients in the mortar. When you are done, add a few drops to the pools and the waters shall run clear once more!

'Ah - if you do not mind, that is. My sister has informed me that I am not to order you around.'
Slime and unnatural plants choke the once-majestic fountains about Bazanmanar.
'You finished cleaning the pools? Wonderful! It is essential that the dwarves have clean drinking water, lest their conquest of this place continue to draw out.'
Collect plant samples ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The foetid fountain pools are located near Bazanmanar.\n\nGolodhril has asked you to bring her samples of the plants from the foetid pools.
'This plant should be nowhere near the fountains. I am sure the Hobgoblins brought it in with them, the filth.'
Treated foetid pools ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mix the clay in the mortar

'You bring plants from the pools? Ech, smells almost as bad those sarrowstones Mother Amma is forever crushing. Give it here then, let me see.\n\n'It is as I expected. The plants are indeed causing the pools to turn sour. Fortunately, I know the remedy! Go on down to Kurdush창lak, the river what cuts through the centre of the gap. On its banks, you will find clay. Bring the clay to me and we shall craft an antidote for the pools.'
Collect clay from Kurdush창lak
Treat foetid pools ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
